english.verse1: You are forever in my life. You see me through the seasons. Cover me with Your hand. And lead me in Your righteousness. And I look to You. And I wait on You.
english.chorus: I will sing to You, Lord. A hymn of love. For Your faithfulness to me. I'm carried in everlasting arms. You'll never let me go. Through it all.

chord.verse1: G D/F# Esus C9 D G D/F# Esus C9 D Bm C9 Bm C9 D
chord.chorus: G C9 D Emsus C9 D G C9 D/F# G C9 D
